channel.title: Video Game Sound Track Mix - BlåMeese
channel.description: So I’ve been working on a mix of video game songs and I was wondering if I should add more to the track I’m making. So far I’m using a song from Dark Castle and Mario. What would you add? https://youtu.be/Dko5WnZ6GYo

item.title: Video Game Sound Track Mix - BlåMeese
item.dc:creator: NotMiles
item.description:
Video game music mash-up [Collab] Work in Progress
So I was recently working on a little remix of the original Donkey Kong when I had and idea. Maybe this could be a fun little collab where… You must create a melody in an any bar loop from a somewhat recognizable game It must be made with stress and copy and pasted to the other stress to pitch shift an octave below or above Must add a drum track using dollar (1 additional drum kit allowed per person for adding on stuff) You may have noticed that I added some sound effects using the other stres…

Read full topic
item.source: Video Game Sound Track Mix - BlåMeese
